project_descr: Innovation  development  initiation plan for development

outputs.output_descr: The initiation plan provides a platform for the CO to develop a framework to foster innovation in programme/project formulation and implementation as well as in operational management. During the initiation phase existing models and frameworks for fostering innovation will be reviewed in order to identify an appropriate approach and framework for the CO within the country context. In addition, existing projects/programmes will be screened for implementation bottlenecks during the initiation phase and up to 3 bottlenecks will be selected for prototyping and testing innovative solutions.
